1 <?php
2 
3 namespace Ubiquity\db\traits;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\exceptions\DBException;
6 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
7 
18 class DatabaseTransactionsTrait {
19  protected static $savepointsDrivers = [ 'pgsql' => true,'mysql' => true,'sqlite' => true ];
20  protected $transactionLevel = 0;
21 
22  protected function nestable() {
23  return isset ( self::$savepointsDrivers [$this->dbType] );
24  }
25 
31  public function beginTransaction() {
32  if ($this->transactionLevel == 0 || ! $this->nestable ()) {
33  $ret = $this->pdoObject->beginTransaction ();
34  Logger::info ( 'Transactions', 'Start transaction', 'beginTransaction' );
35  $this->transactionLevel ++;
36  return $ret;
37  }
38  $this->pdoObject->exec ( 'SAVEPOINT LEVEL' . $this->transactionLevel );
39  Logger::info ( 'Transactions', 'Savepoint level', 'beginTransaction', $this->transactionLevel );
40  $this->transactionLevel ++;
41  return true;
42  }
43 
49  public function commit() {
50  $this->transactionLevel --;
51  if ($this->transactionLevel == 0 || ! $this->nestable ()) {
52  Logger::info ( 'Transactions', 'Commit transaction', 'commit' );
53  return $this->pdoObject->commit ();
54  }
55  $this->pdoObject->exec ( 'RELEASE SAVEPOINT LEVEL' . $this->transactionLevel );
56  Logger::info ( 'Transactions', 'Release savepoint level', 'commit', $this->transactionLevel );
57  return true;
58  }
59 
66  public function commitToLevel($transactionLevel) {
67  $res = true;
68  while ( $res && $this->transactionLevel > $transactionLevel ) {
69  $res = $this->commit ();
70  }
71  return $res;
72  }
73 
79  public function commitAll() {
80  return $this->commitToLevel ( 0 );
81  }
82 
88  public function rollBack() {
89  $this->transactionLevel --;
90 
91  if ($this->transactionLevel == 0 || ! $this->nestable ()) {
92  Logger::info ( 'Transactions', 'Rollback transaction', 'rollBack' );
93  return $this->pdoObject->rollBack ();
94  }
95  $this->pdoObject->exec ( 'ROLLBACK TO SAVEPOINT LEVEL' . $this->transactionLevel );
96  Logger::info ( 'Transactions', 'Rollback to savepoint level', 'rollBack', $this->transactionLevel );
97  return true;
98  }
99 
106  public function rollBackToLevel($transactionLevel) {
107  $res = true;
108  while ( $res && $this->transactionLevel > $transactionLevel ) {
109  $res = $this->rollBack ();
110  }
111  return $res;
112  }
113 
119  public function rollBackAll() {
120  return $this->rollBackToLevel ( 0 );
121  }
122 
128  public function inTransaction() {
129  return $this->pdoObject->inTransaction ();
130  }
131 
140  public function callInTransaction($callback, ...$parameters) {
141  if ($this->beginTransaction ()) {
142  try {
143  $ret = call_user_func_array ( $callback, $parameters );
144  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
145  $this->rollBack ();
146  throw $e;
147  }
148 
149  if ($ret) {
150  if (! $this->commit ()) {
151  throw new DBException ( 'Transaction was not committed.' );
152  }
153  } else {
154  $this->rollBack ();
155  }
156 
157  return $ret;
158  }
159  throw new DBException ( 'Transaction was not started.' );
160  }
161 }
